name: Ghost Cinereus
description:
You don't know who you are or what you are. You just know you need shards that contain fragments of your memory. Collect them and don't let people see what you became. Walk in the shadows and blow the lights off...

A project for the college. The game is not complete but is just a demo.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Space to Blow the lights off and restart if you lose
